A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Super fun\, entertaining movie that was too recycled\, slow\, and pointless at times to be favorite for me. A lot of it seemed like copy/paste from previous movies: beginning AND final scene/hoth\, Rey training with Luke/Luke training with Yoda\, gambling guy/Lando etc. The whole idea of the ships just following each other slowly was.. well\, slow. Rose and Finn's side plot was just pointless. They do a series of video-game like missions and end up failing anyway. Finally\, Snoke's death scene and Leah's marry-poppins floating scene were sadly disappointing. Fun movie and glad I saw it\, but it did its job and nothing more: It made money. Thoughts?
